When I first saw the state of a cafeteria in the grounds of the  
university. Due to students own lack of concern for the  
environment in which they eat and drink. Rubbish and spilled tea  
and coffee left everywhere.

When I as a Pakeha (white) new Zealander, was just as racially  
prejudiced as other people whom I had condemned.

When my husband discovered I was having an affair with another  
man.

I was biking with my boyfriend, the sun shining after a long  
period of bad beather, afterwards we spent the evening and night  
together.

I was hitchhiking and was picked up by a stranger he drove into  
the woods and wanted to make love with me, I refused and escaped  
from the car. When walking in the wood and hearing the car I was  
afraid.

In a discussion the leader wanted to stop because she was of the  
opinion that we were not involved and she misjudged our reactions  
as negative. We however only posed several questions which she  
couldn't answer.

When my grandmother died. She stayed with us until I had the age  
of 10. When she died I was 13 and I remember the moment after the  
funeral: I sat on the table and cried.
When I heard about the disaster in Bophal (India).

Once in a public ladies room, I opened the door of a cubicle that  
was taken, although it was not locked.

In a playground I was playing at the seesaw with a little niece.  
I wanted to stop but nobody came to help me. When I got off, all  
alone the seesaw fell down with a big smash. My niece got hurt  
above her eye. Now there is a scar.
When passing the final examinations for social worker.

Sleeping alone in a tent, while hearing several noises such as  
rustling etc, I am afraid that there are people who are up to no  
good.

A man kept a seat taken by putting his coat on it after a while  
the chair was still empty, I asked him if I could use the chair,  
he didn't agree for the chair was for his coat.
When the relationship with my girlfriend broke up.

A piece of work was marked as bad by the teachers I and some  
fellow students didn't agree with their vague criticism. I felt  
myself taken in by the teachers and felt disgust.

Some weeks ago I experienced a day that everything went wrong I  
broke several things I felt very ashamed for I am not a sloven.

I had made an appointment with a girl to go to the movies, but  
actually I had no mind when we arrived at the cinema, it was a  
full house. I then went back and she went to the movie alone.

A friend came to tell me that her father invited me to go on  
holiday with them in Benidorm otherwise I could not afford to go  
on holiday.

At the age of 12 years I always had to take care of my little  
brother and sister I never could sleep then. I always imagined  
creepy men sneaking into our house.

The landlord had selected a new lodger on her own, while we used  
to do that it was not what she had done, but how she did it that  
made me angry.

It was a complex situation concerning a relationship with a  
boyfriend, I had broken the relationship for some reasons.  
Meanwhile, as I felt it, I had most sorrow.

I saw a terrible accident happen and I laughed a lot of the  
fright and because I was nervous.

My mother wants to talk very often about her life. I dislike this  
because she always talks negatively about the same people  
whatever I do it doesn't help.

At the moment when I heard the result of an examination and it  
proved that I succeeded the second year of my study.

I have a fobic anxiety for elevators. This anxiety is worst at  
the moment when the doors have to open. I have it often in the  
elevator at our university.

When someone accuses me without reason and is not willing to  
listen to me.
My boyfriend decided to make an end to our relationship.

A person I know who tells lies and so pretending to be better  
than she is.

When I am in an auditorium with people and I ask a silly question  
so that everyone starts to laugh.

I moved to Nijmegen for my study. Soon after this my mother had  
to be admitted in hospital because of cardiac compliants. I knew  
that my moving was an important reason for this.

I can't give one description here. I often feel joyful when I  
have done things good in relation to other people especially when  
my friend says he loves me and I also tell him that I love him.

I was afraid when my first boyfriend threatened to make an end to  
our relationship because he didn't love me enough while I loved  
him very much.

A good friend deceived me. Because of that little quarrel our  
relationship finished, mainly because she was not honest. I was  
very angry about that.
I was very sad when my first boyfriend finished our relationship.

I was once raped (one year ago) by a man who was a lot older than  
me and whom I just met. Maybe it wasn't rape but the man wanted  
more than I wanted to give him since there were other people in  
vicinity.

I felt shame when I didn't study enough for my exams and as a  
result I failed. I then invented idle stories to talk it good for  
myself and the others.

I felt guilty when I once went out with another boy and made love  
with him while I had a close boyfriend.
When my boyfriend came back after being away for 10 days.
When I was sitting in a car next to a man who was masturbating.

When my mother told things to my sister, which I told my mother  
in confindence.

Tonight in bed when I realised how bad my relationship with my  
friend was.

When I was in Eindhoven on an Exhibition of Hernan Nitsche, who  
made paintings with real blood. There were also photographs about  
the killing of cows.
When I made an end on a relationship after three years.

That I didn't want my friend to leave on holiday for 10 days  
because I thought I would miss him. I was constantly trying to  
persuade him.

When I was making music together with my friend. It sounded very  
good and we were very satisfied.

When my cat ran under a car and came home wounded. He could  
hardly walk. I didn't dare to go to a veterinarian because I was  
afraid he would kill him.

I had to unscrew something on my car. I didn't succeed after two  
afternoons of trying. A feeling of anger built up itself.

Losing my girlfriend who made an end to our relationship. By this  
I lost an important source of support, certainty and joyful  
moments. I cried very intensly when that happened.

A few days ago I saw two dandy girls of my age. I disliked their  
clothes and their way of doing.

During carnaval I danced for a few minutes normally I don't dance  
because I am rigid in my moving around during a dance, I stopped  
very soon.

I had a girlfriend which I used to call regularly. Then I didn't  
phone her for a while. At a certain moment I felt a little  
tension which became worse.

At an important moment in a volleyball game we made a point and  
by this we won a set from a much stronger competitor.

When I went out with my dog in a forest late at night when we  
were on a camping.

I had an appointment with someone at a certain time. The other  
person didn't appear.

When I entered the operation theatre and underwent a difficult  
operation.

When my friends left without waiting for me, after we had arranged  
to go out together.
When they gave away my dog to other people without my knowledge.
When I had to eat scraps from a dust-bin, because of a bet.

At the airport, eighty beer cans that I was carrying in a  
bag spread all around while I was going through the metal  
detector.

When I took a car which was not mine, and suddenly it stopped  
working.

When the Real Madrid team of basket ball qualified for the final  
of the Europe Cup at Athens.
On the scenic railway at the fairground.
At having an argument with a stranger, in the street.
When I entered a toilet in a bar and it stank.
The day I finished my military service.

When I was a child, one day, I was going home late at night and I  
did not notice an uncovered man hole and fell in it.  I was in there for  
several minutes.
One day, when I was a child, my grandmother shut me up in a room.
The day I left my first girlfriend.

One day I was in the countryside with several friends, and we  
began to eat figs, after we were all full we noticed that all the  
figs were full of worms.

When I got my fingers stuck in one of the side holes of the door,  
in the tube.

I ran over my dog with a bicycle when I was carrying him tied to  
the handle bar.
When I won the first prize in a cross country race.

I found myself involved in a fight in which a person died and I  
had to intervene with some risk.

An argument among friends in which my opinions on the way to  
spend spare time were disapproved.
I was forced to leave an unforgettable friend.

I saw the gare of a prison.  This gare and the building were in  
deplorable condition and were full of rubbish.
A mishap suffered on misinterpreting a girl's proposition.

I thought that I could have avoided the above situation (the one  
in fear) if I had concentrated more on my work, which I hate.
When I passed the last exam, which I had doudts about.
Before I had a tooth pulled out.  I was very upset and ill.

When the Real Madrid football team lost against the inter in the  
U.E.F.A cup.

When my dog died.  I had reared it for nearly three years.  It  
had been ill for several days and had not eaten anything.  One  
morning I found it dead.

On a trip to Santander a child sitting beside me fell ill and  
started to vomit, seeing this made me feel very bad.

I fell down in the bus when it braked suddenly and everybody  
started looking at me.

When I finished a test type of exam and did not dare to answer  
any question, I doubted whether I would pass the exam  or not.

When I was back home after a long time, meeting beloved people  
and close friends.

When I heard about the treatment of a friend in jail. Really  
inhuman. I never realised that such things also happen in the  
Netherlands.

I cannot remember a situation in which I felt ashamed. I was  
eating with some people and a little boy I took care of. I warned  
him often not to knock down his glass of mild. When I took  
out his chair I knocked down my own glass.

My mother always took my side. That brought about quarrels with  
my father. I knew she didn't like that and I felt very sorry for  
that.

When on holiday in Greece I called my best friend, she told me  
she passed the examinations and that she had been admitted to the  
study for speech therapy.

Together with a little brother I biked on a lonely road in the  
Polder. Then we were annoyed by a boy on a motorbike: he  
took over, stopped, took over, etc. Then we saw he had something  
in his hand, we turned until we came across a man, who  
accompanied us.

We lived with 3 persons in the loft of a house. It often occurred  
that other persons again and again climbed the stairs with much  
noise. When I was studying I couldn't concentrate and got angry.

I partly colored my hair black. My mother didn't like it and  
reproached me to be a "subversive element". Later on she stated  
that this was due to my friends. As I see it, this all resulted  
from colouring my hair.

I was shopping in Utrecht with friends, we also ate some chips  
and snacks in a snackbar, then we saw a shabby fellow. He took a  
cold half eaten croquette (a snack) from a rubbish bin and eat  
it.

I had subscribed for this test. We were informed by our  
secretary where the test took place. We went over there and thought  
there was a course. So we went back again I felt ashamed that the  
secretary again should see me.

I was out with a friend in a place where it was very, very busy.  
When we wanted to go I bumped a person, who dropped his glass  
beer I offered a new one but he didn't accept it.

It appeared that I gave correct answers to all questions during  
an examination of personality while I thought I performed very  
badly. Even now, I don't know how I managed it.

My father was very angry with me, and I locked me up in the  
shower. Then my father knocked his fist through the door, I was  
scared to death.

My sister borrowed some LP records for a party. She had left them  
in the car on curatao. Due to the heat they were crooked, so I  
couldn't play them again.

When my grandmother died, her life was heavy and her last hours  
were terrible.

When I watched TV and saw a performance of "Prince" (a popidol).  
Disgusting he'd better be a stallion.

We had arranged a beach party with 20 people. There my father got  
drunk I felt very ashamed.

When I flew out to my mother and made rude remarks because I felt  
so tense (studied too hard for an examination).

Unofficially I was informed about my results of the final  
examination of the secondary school. A teacher wrote them up for  
me. When I went outside, I started crying with joy.

I am thinking about death, the eternal of it, the unknown, the  
sense of being here. Often, laying in bed in the dark and quiet,  
the fear makes me feel dizzy.

If they force me to eat something I don't like. For example, my  
parents always twaddle and whine, when I don't eat all the food.

I had to leave Den Helder and all friends and acquaintences,  
after having spend two weeks there with my friends.

Being on view in a meat-factory. Pigs being cut open, pigs being  
suspended from nods, blood everywhere, decompsition.

When I have suffered a terrible fit of eating, that frequently  
occurs. Then I eat everything, I act like a glutton I eat big  
amounts of food, sometimes even half a loaf.

When my father (physically handicapped) asks me to do something  
and I raise several objections. Often I can fix it in few  
moments.

When the parents of my girlfriend gave permission to spend our  
holiday together.

When the relationship with my first girlfriend broke up and I  
realized it too late.

Someone who always took care for the key of the sportshall stayed  
away without letting us know. Next time he did as if nothing had  
happened.
When my last relation broke up.

When working in a chemical laundry, I saw rats and maggots in the  
washing.

When I forgot the birthday of my best friend and I innocently  
came to visit her one week later.

When I made love with a girl, which I don't really love. However  
I know that she loves me.
When I passed the driving test (on the second try).

I was walking in the wood at night with my boyfriend. Very  
romantic. Suddenly I heard a car driving very slowly with the  
lights out, it looked as if they were looking for something.

I am a teacher in arts and crafts (boys from 15-16 years). for  
them it is obligatory and they dislike it. They tease me. When one of  
them cut up some material I flared up.

My sister was in coma for 3 months (due to a train accident). Now  
her brainfunctions are disturbed. She will never be able to walk  
and she can hardly talk.

I lived together with my boyfriend. One night he stayed away and  
next day he told me that he had chat up with another girl.

I talk too much, cannot keep things secret. I promised a friend  
not to tell something to anybody. Neverthless, I did, and she got  
informed about it. I felt very ashamed.

My parents appreciate very much me and my boyfriend coming and  
have dinner with them at Christmas. However we decided to visit  
his parents. My mother was rather disappointed.

When I started a relation with a girl, with whom I have fallen in  
love already some time ago.

Once sitting in the cinema, I became very anxious (watching a  
"cold" film). I do not know the reason.

I work for a journal. Once the lay-out came to nothing, due to  
thoughtlessness of some colleagues.

My mother was stuck by an apoplectic fit, was hemi-paralyzed and  
suffered an aphasia.

Each time I am confronted with reports about repression and  
torture.

I wrote a letter to my father to ventilate my bottled up  
feelings. Afterwards I thought it was too negative.

I chatted up with a girl who I didn't love. She however was  
fallen in love with me. I felt responsible for her sorrow.

I felt very happy when I heard I had passed the examination to  
move up to the second year course.

On a holiday in France I made a walk in the woods all alone and  
very relaxed. Then a motorbike took me over and I saw the man  
watching all the time. Suddenly the man stood behing me and I ran  
away fast.

I invited two friends. We should go out together. Those two girls  
kept talking about boys, chatting up etc. I bacame sick of it.

I felt very sad when my boyfriend wanted to break our  
relationship. Our relationship lasted two years, we shared  
everything and all this was finished.

I broke an egg, with which there was something wrong, into a  
little cup. There was a thick white "wad" in it. I tried to take  
it out and throw it in the sink.

When I was 10 years old I stained our bench with a fountain-pen,  
I tried to twin the cushions, but then there were colour nuances.  
Then my mother catched me, she saw it and became very angry.

I spend the night with my boyfriend, while there was also a  
friend of his. We all lay on the floor to sleep. When my  
boyfriend was fallen asleep the other boy and I started petting.  
After 15 minutes I felt miserable and awoke my boyfriend to tell  
him that.

I liked to see off my aunt (from Zaire) to the airport. That  
appeared to be impossible because I had to go to school. For long  
time I wasn't sure if I could accompany her. Two days before the  
departure they told me I was allowed to miss school.

I went to the ballet lessons with a little friend in the dark. On  
a very quiet place a boy approached us from behind and asked at  
what time the lesson would be finished. I gave him an avoiding  
answer, he took me up and wanted to run away with me.

I was sleeping nicely until in the middle of the night when I became  
awake because a friend called me for some (in my opinion)  
nonsens reason.

My boyfriend with whom I had a longlasting relationship, fell in  
love with another girl, then he asked me something which implied  
that he loved that girl more than he loved me.

On school, during a fancy fair, there was a stand of amnesty  
international. There I read (for the first time) a description of  
the tortures of a woman, what they did to her.

A friend catched me while masturbating. I am not fully sure  
whether she saw it or not.

When I was 4-5 years old my mother gave me some parts of a  
chocolate bar and ordered me to bring it to my father working  
outside. On my way I could not resist the temptation and ate it  
myself.

When I had to undergo the final examination of secondary school,  
I lived together with a girlfriend. We both were afraid to fail,  
but it appeard that we both had passed.

When I had left my home, my father, under false pretences, got me  
in his car and drove home where we were all alone. He was seethed  
with rage because I withrew from his authority. He hit me, kicked  
me and threatened me.

When my father took away my cherised diaries to burn them (I was  
also very sad) "Oh, how I hated him".

I felt very sad when I left home because I could not stand it any  
longer. I do not regret it, but I missed my little sister very  
much (and she missed me). These feelings wear off over time.

A friend and a girlfriend went to Rome for 10 days with their  
class. When they were back home I heard people tell "strange"  
stories about my friend and that girlfriend.

When my mother found a leaf of my diary where I had written about  
my mother's lack of education, especially her poor arithmetical  
insight.

Very often I take care for my little sister and oversee her  
duties. Most of the time everything went fine, but sometimes she  
absolutely didn't want to obey; then I hit her (we frequently  
were hit by our father).
Passing my driver's examination (after two failures).

When I was six years old we were on holiday in France. There was  
very heavy weather then.

A quarrel with my mother because I thought she said very  
unreasonable things about me, that hit me strongly.

The disease and subsequent death of a close acquaintance. Sadness  
was accompanied with feelings of powerlessness (I also  
experienced sadness in the situation described under guilt).

When I take a look into a slaughter-house and when listening to  
stories about torturing people or animals.

Making bloopers: e.g. telling something negative about a certain  
person, while that person is standing besides you and hears  
everything.

I wanted to finish a relationship after 3 months. Unfortunately  
my friend had a different opinion. I could not answer his  
feelings this made him unhappy, and me feel guilty.

When a friend of mine had her period, while thinking she was  
pregnant.
Fear to come and live in Nijmegen.
When the coach of our team degraded me to the second team.
When a friend died.

When I saw a documentary film about World War II (about Hitler  
and his adepts).

When I embarrassed a friend by asking him aloud if a certain  
person was "the source of gossip" he told me about, while that  
person was also present.

When I realised that I had rejected a boy, who was fallen in love  
with me, rather bluntly four times.

Spending the nitht with close friends, after being away (out of  
Nijmegen) for a while.

Just before I started my study I had to move, I was very afraid  
to be left alone and that I could not manage it.

When anybody wants to make me feel guilty. For example: I should  
do something for my mother, but things didn't go as she hoped.  
Then she threatens: I'll do it myself.

When a close friend took leave of me, because she went to Israel  
for one year.

I wanted to take something from under my bed. While doing this I  
felt a dead bird laying under my bed.

I stayed at home for a period because I felt depressive and I  
neglected my study when people adked me, I told them that I had  
freeterm and studied hard. I felt ashamed for my behavior and  
lies.

After a quarrel with my mother in which matters were "inflated"  
enormously.

A fellow player, quite unexpectedly, scores a goal, which means a  
draw.

In college, I started a discussion with the teacher referring to  
a question I posed. I felt very unsure and I was afraid to fail.

While playing indoor-hockey, there always is an older man who  
frequently and intentionally plays the ball out of the field. In  
my opinion this is very childish, because we play for fun only.

I was together with my family one night, a few days after my  
father had died, during that conversation I expressed my  
displeasure because nobody understands me.

Salo, a movie film by Pasolini. People were misused and tortured  
for the fun of a few elder Italian authorities, during World War  
II.

I was jerking me off in my bedroom, when suddenly, my mother came  
in. She looked at me and immediately left the room.

My girlfriend and I agreed to go to the cinema. However I  
completely forgot our appointment. I remembered it two hours  
too late when I went to visit her.

When my boyfriend once again told me that he loved me after a  
period in which he felt very depressive.

I was walking alone in the street late at night (2.30 am). It was  
very quiet. Then a man approached me and said "Hello".
When, late at night, I discovered that they had stolen my bike.

When a friend, after being free of drugs for half a year, started  
using them again.
In a disco, there was a dirty little chap who punched my bottom.

When a friend who comes visiting me unexpectedly asks for coffee  
and I refuse to give him this.

Watching a football game. This remindes me of the time when my  
father was still alive and when we watched football games on TV  
together.
Seeing someone who has bleeding nose.

Asking someone to give me back the money I once lend him because  
I needed it myself.

When I tell someone no. In other words when I refuse to do  
something although I could have helped him.
When I got a good grade for an exam in statistics.

One night at three o'clock I was followed by a cardriver, who  
tried to molest me.

My father promised me a bicycle for my birthday. Just before my  
birthday he forgot he promised this to me.
A younger brother of a good friend of mine died (asthma).

I read a book about torture. The book described exactly how the  
torturing was done.

I made a joke about the rat of a boy. I compared his rat with a  
sausage. I told the boy he had a delicious sausage.

After a courtship of three months I made an end to it. The boy  
was very sad about this.
I had a very pleasant conversation with one of my friends.

I had a dream about my fiancTe leaving me and making an end to  
our relation.
My bicycle was demolished.

During the funeral of my grandmother, when I saw my mother and  
other family members crying.

A fellow student who seemed very nice later on proved to be a  
slimy fellow towards a professor.

My father was very angry with another man in the presence of my  
friends.

I once drank too much alcohol and became very ill. This was in the  
presence of my friends.

This week I was phoned by an old friend with whom I lost contact  
a few years ago.
I was raped by a friend.

Last year I had a friend visiting me for several days. The only  
thing he did was sleeping, drinking, taking pills and thinking  
only about himself.

My girlfriend does practice and therefore leaves me alone at  
night and in the weekend. In addition, she is very busy doing  
several things. So we don't see each other often.

My father suddenly fell ill. He stayed for 3 months in the  
hospital: the last month on intensive care of the Academic  
Hospital, then he died.

Bisshop Ter Schure intoduced himself on TV to the Dutch Nation.  
He spoke as if he was God himself, and didn't discuss the way he  
had achieved this position.
After having failed my driving test.

When I see that my mother forces my little brother (15 years) to  
work very hard for school. I don't agree that she constantly puts  
him to work, but I don't tell it to her, so nothing changes.

I thought that someone was angry with me but, by hindsight, that  
didn't appear to be the case, he even liked me.

Once, late at night, I was biking home and overtook a man. He  
said to me "Hello darling" I was terrified and imagined the  
wildest scenes.

My parents thought that I didn't do my best to pass the final  
examination (secondary school). When I achieved a good grade they  
said nothing, but if I had had a bad grade they would have become  
very angry.

When I caused much pain and sorrow to my boyfriend by finishing  
our relationship.

When I read about or think about environmental pollution, the  
armor race, starvation, etc. Then one realizes that mankind is  
bad, most important is power and money, at the cost of nature and  
mankind.
When I imitated a teacher behind his back - walking very silly.

I told someone that I still had a relationship with a boy  
although it was finished already 3 months before. That person  
seriously discussed several things relating that issue. Then I  
felt very miserable because I had told lies.

A meeting and a conversation with a woman (somewhat elder than  
me) who considers me as her child (she also has one child of her  
own). Last two years I lived with her (no relationship).

As a child I suffered of nightmares. Even since than, I have  
never been so anxious and fearful.

When talking with my sister, she often ventilates prejudices,  
which my father also adheres.

I was in a hopeless situation in a dirty place. No study, no  
work, only loneliness.

It is very difficult to relate it to a certain event. I am  
familiar with the disgust of Sartre (la nausTe), a frequently  
occurring cause may be described as "the self-assured dullness".

Recently, I left my bag in the car of someone who picked me up  
while hitch-hiking. I spent some effort to find out where he  
lived (I succeeded).

In Biarritz (the South of France) I met some English students  
who, especially for me, went to Paris and gave me food, while I  
didn't have any more money.

When I passed the driving test already on the first try, although  
I felt more and more uncertain as the day came near.

When my father suffered with dizziness. He had to be  
hospitalized, because the physician didn't know what was wrong.  
Because his stools were black, I thought it could be cancer.

When I arranged our holiday in Paris, and my girlfriend raised  
criticisms all the time.

When it suddenly appeared that our dog was dangerously ill and  
probably would die. We had not expected this because he  
was always very healthy. Fortunately he survived because we, in turn,  
gave him medicines during the night.

When a girl in my class (on the secondary school) appeased the  
teacher, resulting in getting a higher grade. This occurred often  
with her.

When I arrived too late at a meeting of mentor (the night before  
the introduction of novices on the University start).

When my father told me that I should help my mother more often,  
because she was so busy. And I realized that he was right.
Passing an examination, although I felt sure I had failed.

I lived in a student-house, where you shared the lavatory and  
shower with a fellow student. the shower cubicle formed the  
connection between both appartments. My neighbour very often was  
drunk and aggressive. One night, I was afraid that he would enter  
my room.

I suffer from a disease of my muscles. Therefore, I am only able  
to attend lectures for half a day. So, sometimes I miss  
obligatory lectures. However, the teachers do not take into  
account my disease, and punish me with detention work, resulting in  
an overload.

I suffer form a disease of my muscles. However, I cannot talk  
about it and my feelings, the consequence with my parents. They  
try to repress it.

Grandfather lives in a home for the elderly. He always looks  
forward to visits. On his birthday (by coincidence it was on  
"Mummy's day") however, nobody went to see him. Is the own family  
more important than grandfather ?
Going out for dinner, or during one ice-cream and four spoons.

I borrowed a piece of music of someone and I always forgot to  
give it back. That person wrote me a letter asking me to give it  
back. I did so and I told him an idle story why I kept it for so  
long.
When armed robbers broke into our house at night.

When a pick-pocket robbed me of my money (K20) while I  was  
buying bathing soap.
When I failed the grade seven examination.

When my friend who was drunk insulted me in public for no reason at  
all.
When I tried to steal a book from the bookshop and was caught.

When I was caught with another man's wife.  I had taken the  
opportuinty as this man was abroad but he returned that night.
The day I learnt that I had been admitted to the university.

When I had gone for a boxing tournament which ended at 2 o'clock  
in the morning.  I was alone on my way back, and I could hear the  
barking of the dogs, the nocturnal animals and the sound of my      
own footsteps.  There had been a rumour  circulating that there  
were ghosts in that area.

In 1983 a sadist provoked my sister in my presence.  He tried  
to force my sister into accompanying him to his place, but my  
sister did not agree and so she was kicked and she fell down.   
There was a fight.

When my father passed away in 1978.  I was left alone with my  
mother who was very sick so I had to go and live with my aunt, who  
is very short tempered, till my mother was discharged from the  
hospital.
When I learnt that my best friend had failed the exams.
I broke my friend's badminton racket and she kept quiet about it.

"Boy, you have been admitted to the medicine school and your  
uncle is coming back fron Canada next week," my father told me  
and it was a happy moment.

I was in form five at the boarding school and my friends and I  
had gone drinknig beer in the nearby village.  And we were caught  
red handed there by a form master.
When my mother quarrelled with my aunt over me.

My elder brother had been expelled from college and he was so  
frustated that he attempted suicide - he drank bottle fragments.   
I was very sad when I learnt this.

I found out accidentaly that while my uncle was away in Canada, my  
aunt had been bedding a young man on a regular basis.

It was during a school holiday - I was found necking a girl in my  
room by my father.

I was in grade seven and my class was planning a protest against  
a rude and immoral teacher.  I sneaked out and told the  
headmaster about it and so the plan was foiled.

I won the first prize at the science fair, the first of the kind  
at school and I was only in form II then.

A close relative of mine died in a serious car accident.  I was  
one of the first two people to see the corpse and I had to do it.  
 Before going in to see it I was afraid as it was the first time  
that I was seeing a corpse.

My younger brother destroyed and gave away some of the books that  
I had intended to keep for as long as possible.

When a close relative of mine passed away, it was the first time  
that someone so close to me had died.

A person whom I thought to be honest took and spend the little  
money that I had and I had no way of getting any money in the  
few following months.

While watching a religious film, I got very excited and made a  
number of comments which were reproached to me by an elderly  
person who respected me.

I beat up a female friend after I heard the defamatory stories that  
she had been telling.  I was later called to explain my  
behaviour.

My 21st birthday celebration, when I cut the cake and received  
the presents.

Before one of my final exams of the third year - natural  
sciences.

When some seniors tried to scold and insult some juniors on  
account of what the juniors were supposed to have said at  
secondary school.

When an uncle of mine, who was close to me, passed away after  
having had a stroke, before his first daughter could be named.
When my sister's boyfriend accused her of having been sleeping around.

When I could not hold my bladder while making a telephone call  
and ended up wetting myself.

When I was made to feel responsible for the emotional state a friend of  
mine was in.
My fiancT left me for my best friend.
People who discriminate other people disgust me.

On New Years eve I drank too much alcohol, so much that I had to  
vomit in the presence of other people.

I have cut loose from my father a few years ago. I know he is  
very sad about this.
A recurrent lovesickness.
I was sexually assaulted one night by a stranger.

Meddlesomeness of my mother about the way I live. She thinks I am  
to free in my behavior for instance when a boyfriend stays the  
night.
The dying of a close member of the family.
Seeing maltreated, dead animals.

A much older man took advantage of me during my childhood (four  
to eight years of age).

When my friend needed my help very much and I, at that moment, made  
an end to our relationship.
When I passed a very important exam.

When a man rang the doorbell and wanted to enter the house with  
violence. I was alone at home that moment.

A friend came to visit me late one night. He promised to stay  
only a quarter of an hour, but he stayed 5 hours !! He didn't  
leave and I was very angry.

I had to terminate a training because I wasn't suited for it. I  
was very sad about this, because I very much wanted to finish  
that training.

During my birthday party a friend drank too much alcohol. So much  
that he had to throw up. Worst of all was that he couldn't leave  
my friend alone and that he was molesting her.

I tried to swindle a jeweller because my watch was broken and I  
wanted to have it repaired it was a pity but they detected it.

Someone had to do a lot of efforts to make something work. With  
my help he would have finished much sooner, but I wasn't in the  
mood to help him.
I went to visit friends and it was very companionable.

I wanted to get in contact with a girl I loved, but I was afraid  
she would refuse me.

During military service a superior reproached me unjustly. This  
led to friction in a lot of situations.

Disappointed love. The girl made an end to our relationship while  
I thought she was in love with me.

During military service I heard the story of someone who tried to  
commit suicide and as a result of this got a week custody.

I thought of myself as being clumsy when I made love for the  
first time with a girl.

A friend of mine had a bicycle-accident because I pulled at his  
handlebar.

Sitting alone in a quiet room concentrating on things happening  
around me which pleases me.

Sitting alone in a quiet room, concetrating on things happening  
around you. Thoughts come into my mind which make me afraid.

When a teacher tells a story which isn't true. It only reflects  
his way of interpreting reality.

I have high expectations for my future but if I pursue the  
subject in this manner I will not attain this.

I heard a broadcasting programme about parapsychology. The people  
in this programme used very difficult words which I couldn't  
understand. They acted exaggerated without showing any feeling.

A girl asked me why I didn't dance. I told her I was ashamed to  
dance. I felt myself ashamed having to tell her this.

I saved up money for a good purpose. As I also have to organise a  
party I am afraid there will rest only a little money for the  
good purpose I feel guilty about this.

My sister and brother in law returned from Sri Lanka where they  
adopted a child. I went to pick them up at the airport.

During a football game I made an offence towards an acquaintance.  
Later on this acquaintance also tackeled me and the game became  
very rude.

I work at a petrol station. When there is a foreigner who wants  
petrol my collegues treat him very impolite.

An uncle of mine who just retired, having worked hard all his  
life, got a cerebral hemorrhage.

A student who lives in the same house where I live is an alcoholic. He  
tries to manipulate other people with his money when he has drunk  
too much.

When I went to a disco with a friend I started behaving badly  
embarrassing him without reason.

When I talked to another student about the notes she got last  
semester, not knowing that she got a lot of bad grades.
When I got my drivers licence.

When I stayed alone in a house in Great Brittain and there was a  
lot of rumour in the newspaper about a murderer still being free.
The stories about the way my grandmother treated my mother.
When my mother was proved to suffer from a very serious disease.

The stories about my aunt who was beaten and humiliated by my  
uncle.

I omitted to do a favor to a friend, while he was very much in  
need for help.
When I had a little accident with my boss'car.

Every year during carnival I am very joyful I have an intense  
feeling of happiness then.

The only event I can remember is having a nightmare when I was  
very young (3 years old) I dreamt about a machine which was going  
to crush me.

I am usually angry at myself. This happens often. For instace  
when I want to pet without falling in love and it soon proves  
that I have fallen in love with him.

Losing a boyfriend for the second time to my friend. He fell in  
love with her. The same thing happened a few months earlier with  
another boyfriend.

There is a person whom I disgust. Evrey time I see her I get this  
terrible feeling I disgust her whole appearance.

When I am angry at someone without a good reason. Later on it  
proves that he didn't do anything wrong.

My mother always evokes feelings of guilt in me. For instance  
when I miss the last bus I know she will be concerned for me and  
stay awake till I arrive.

When I came again in contact with a girl I liked very much. And  
most important she also liked me.

After a hard day at the university I also had to make dinner that  
evening. It failed because of a frying pan which broke.
When my father had a cerebral hemorrhage.

A story I heard recently about a baby dying after sexual  
abuse.

During a party I overheard a conversation about china. When I  
wanted to give my opinion one of the people came out to be Chinese  
and his opinion was right of course.

When I didn't bring my girlfriend home one night. Later she told  
me that a cardriver solicited her.

When an old schoolfriend phoned me to arrange an appointment to  
talk about old memories. I hadn't seen him for 8 years.

Standing in a crowed shop or in a closed room with too much  
people in it. This gives me a fearful experience.

My older brother who gives me unwanted advices about problems in  
my relationship with my girlfriend.

My girlfriend left the house in which we lived together a few  
months ago. This made me very sad.

When my parents behave very "witty" towards me, they make insipid  
jokes about which they laugh. Or my mother who treats me like a  
little child.

Making an unexpected talk with a professor in the canteen. This  
made me shy.

Flirting with other girls while I already had a very good  
relationship. When there are problems in my relationship, the  
flirting increases as does the feeling of guilt.

Occurs frequently. A recent experience: when going out with many  
friends, nice music, after the examinations, I felt so happy I  
could have embraced everybody.

I lived alone in a repulsive area in the city of Rotterdam. I was  
annoyed, heard a lot of Burglary and assaults. Especially in the evening  
and the night I frequently felt anxious.
Being treated unfairly and being hurt by someone I love.

When I finished a relation after four years, leading to much  
sorrow for the other one and myself ("although it was the best  
solution").

Every time I meet a certain person. We cannot get on well  
together, we dislike each other.
When coming up for trial because of shop lifting.
Being catched when stealing.

I fell over head and ears in love with someone who appeared to be  
in love with me. it made me so happy that I could hardly sleep  
and eat for one week.

One night I had to bike home all alone after a party. Then I  
found out that I was pursued by a man in a car.

I had a quarrel with my father, because I was of the opinion that  
he decided in an authoritarian way which TV program we should  
watch. I became very angry and started throwing things through  
the room.

My boyfriend finished our relationship when I started studying  
psychology in Nijegen, because then we would not be able to meet  
frequently anymore.

A friend had a quarrel with the mother of her boyfriend because  
she and her friend decided to go and live together. She needed  
money for removal, then she made a great effort to reconcile.

I was catched when, as a little girl, I played tricks. I was very  
startled then and wet my pants.

I was of the opinion that 12.00 pm was too early to be back at  
home after going out, so I stayed away longer, knowing that my  
mother would be worried.
I was called and invited to have a talk about a job I wanted to have.

Once late at night (around midnight) a person asked me to give  
him a lift. He suddenly tried to attack me but I could escape.  
After this he followed me for a little while.

There was a lot of irritation between me and a person who lives  
in the same house where I live. Suddenly it became too much for me and I  
accused him of several things.

The end of a relationship (after 4 years) by doing this I hurt  
the other person very much.

I saw a terrible accident in which the driver of a motor was  
thrown through the frontwindow of a car. His face was completely  
away.

I am troubled by hair growing in my neck. I was troubled by this  
for a long time and was much ashamed when someone brought his/her  
hands close to my face.

Against the will and without the approval of my parents I went  
for a few days to my boyfriend in Germany.
When a friend of me came for an unexpected visit.
When I thought the house was on fire at night.

When I was at an official meeting I asked a question to a person.  
His response was not directed at me but at the chairman.
When the mother of a good friend of mine died.

A teacher was very blunt in his relation to a child so that the  
child was very upset when arriving at home.
I was very angry at someone.
That I didn't take the time to make an appointment with someone.

After I saw my family and good friends back after staying one  
year in a foreign country.

When a good friend of mine behaved in a very cool manner to me  
for a very long time.

I was in the library of medical psychology and walked into the  
wrong direction. A man who came out of a room threated me very  
denigrating and I became very angry in a resisting manner.

A good friend of mine died. During the funeral I felt an intense  
feeling of sadness.

When an uncle of mine who is very ill started to cough wich  
sounded very dirty. (He can't help it of course).

At Christmas night there was a good movie on television which I  
wanted to see for years. I was whining about it till someone told  
me it was very childish. Then I felt shame.

A good friend of mine who is at the moment in a foreign country.  
I didn't write her for several months and now I feel guilty.

When I go out with my friend with enough money and good sense to  
our favorite dancing.
When going out I am threatened regularly by two punk-girls.
A friend started to shout at me. He called me an old frump.

My relationship with a boyfriend was finished and I didn't  
succeed a years-course.

My father is someone I disgust. So when he comes close to me  
a feeling of disgust overwhelms me. When I stay a week-end at my  
parent's place I will remember it for long time.

After a party in which I made love with a boy in public. Later on  
I heard that others were talking about me and called me a slut.

When I got associated with a boy one year ago, I neglected my  
best friend. When the relation with this boy finished she behaved  
very easy-going towards me. I felt guilty then.

When I made the winning goal during a very important football  
game.

A terrible cloud-burst started when we were camping in a tent on  
a great bald field.

Seeing for the first time pictures about the so called  
"treatment" of Jewish people in Nazi-Germany during World War II.

The death of my mother-in-law after a long sick-bed. at the  
moment of dying I was with her.

I was looking at a one-man show on television. He told very  
disgusting things so that I started to be disgusted with it.  
(Later on it proved that this was his intention).

I was drinking a glass of wine and eating something when there  
suddenly appeared pictures about the famine in some parts of  
Africa.

When I don't go to my parents on Sunday and phone them to tell  
them that I have to study. The truth is that I listened to sports  
on the radio.

When it appeared that I was not pregnant when I was several weeks  
overtime.

The same situation as with sadness. I was afraid about what my  
parents would further do to distroy my relationship.
Once again my parents distroyed a relationship.

I had this feeling when my parents distroyed a relationship with  
a boy because they thought he was bad and irresponsible.

After the accident which I described in SHAME. I came to myself  
and saw how terrible everything looked like. I disgusted myself  
and everything I saw.
A sudden end to the relationship with my first girlfriend.

I heard part of a conversation in which one talked very low about  
women.
In an important situation for me, my father behaved inadequately.
When I took the car of someone without saying it to him.

I felt joy when I heard that I was accepted for the Free  
University in Driebergen.

When a good friend of me told me one evening that she didn't want  
to live anymore.

I felt anger when at the end of a telephone call, a good friend  
told me that she would go to travel next year with another good  
friend. We couldn't talk this out.

I was very sad when I had to leave persons with whom I had a very  
intense relationship I also had to leave the environment which  
was part of this.

I felt disgust after watching a picture on television about  
torturing political prisoners in India (this happened in the  
India of Indira Ghandi).

I made a very insulting remark against a person whom I care for  
very much. This event was caused by a third person who didn't  
like the person I insulted.

I felt guilt towards my mother when I went to live on rooms in  
Nijmegen where I study.

When my boyfriend and I went out for a dinner and subsequently  
went to his family. We had a very nice evening.

When I walk through streets late at night. This is because I and  
my friends were attacked one night without any reason for it.

When I got the feeling that I had to do all the housekeeping  
while my boyfriend didn't do anything. This happened in a period  
of exams when I had to study very hard.

When my best friend got a boyfriend. Because of this a  
relationship of ten years was finished abruptely.

I feel disgust when hearing or seeing other people being treated  
inhumanely. For example torturing in chili.

In my opinion guilt is a feeling which goes together with shame.  
Here then I refer to the situation of guilt.

When I became angry at my boyfriend without any reason. I know he  
cannot bear me being angry at him and that he can't study anymore  
then.
The day I heard that I passed the high school exam.

I was living in rooms in a very lonely, quiet neigbourhood.  
During the night it was very silent and this frightened me. The  
fact of being alone in that house frightened me.

We had to move to a very different city because the company where  
my father worked also moved to that place. It was very difficult  
for me to make new friends than.

A very close friend of mine died. I read it in the newspaper. I  
didn't know what to do and thought about it the whole day.

A girl who also hires a room in the house where I live always  
tries to make a quarrel with everyone available she disgusts me.

A teacher spent a lot of time helping me without wanting to be  
paid for it. For the exam I didn't got a good grade and I felt  
ashamed.

I knew I had to take an exam very soon but yet I couldn't start  
studying. I also knew it was very imprtant to succeed the exam  
this time.

When Christmas holiday started, I felt very joyful when I  
finished my last exam.

I was raped once when I went through a dark alley at the back of  
our house. The man pushed me in the bushes. I fought back and  
succeeded to escape.

I was very angry at my father when he didn't give me as much  
money as my brother to use for studying. Once again my brother  
was better off then me.

When my gradmother died.  I felt very sad then ... The feeling  
started to be worse after a while.
When I ate a rotten apple.

When I didn't meet an appointment I had made. The person phoned  
me but I thought of something (I told I was ill) so that I didn't  
have to go.

When I have to take exams I am very excited and have not much  
time for the housekeeping. Then my friend has to do everything.

My boyfriend was playing with my cat. He was playing games with her  
and telling nice things to her.

When I slept for the first time all alone in the house where I  
live now. A man phoned me at 2.00 am. He wanted something from  
me. I was afraid.

My boyfriend told me that I had very high demands towards him. In  
my opinion this was wrong.

I hadn't been at my parent's place for a long time. When I went to  
visit them I had high expectations, but when I was there it was  
very different from what I expected.

I read a story in the newspaper about butchers treating their  
animals very badly. They disgusted me.

I was eating in a very nice restaurant, when the servant asked  
whether I liked the food I told him that I liked it but that  
there was one thing which wasn't so good. The servant than worked  
very hard to make it good.

A few weeks ago I thought about an exam I had to take soon. I  
remembered this just before I had to go to sleep. I felt guilt  
because at the beginning of the year I planned to succeed.

During my high school time I succeeded to play a concert of  
Mozart on the piano when I gave my first performance I succeeded  
to play it very well.

When a car ran into me. The moment that I felt on the street I  
thought "This is my end, I am going to die".

When our cat was killed in a car-accident I was very angry at the  
driver of the car because he didn't take enough care.

There is a boy who I love very much. I asked him to have dinner  
with me, but he refused I don't know why he didn't go with me,  
but I felt very lonely.
I saw a dog who was eating excrements.

During my Highschool time I was chairman of the student's  
comitee. In this function I once had to make a speech to a large  
audience and I was very nervous. After three sentences I forgot  
my text.

During a holiday in East-Germany I got aquainted with a boy who  
lived there. We started writing, but I only wrote once. I felt  
ashamed because I probably was one of his sparse contacts with  
western Europe.

When I saw a good friend again after not having seen her for a  
long time.

When I slipped on a glazed frost road and a car almost ran into  
me.

When people without my permission pry in my belongings and take  
things out of it.

When I noticed that my parents were not in such a prosperity as  
most people in my surroundings.
Seeing a pornographic movie in which animals were used.
When I went for the first time in my life to a nudist-beach.
I was caught sneaking sweets.

When I went to visit a friend in the hospital. She had to undergo  
an operation for rupture. I was glad to hear that the operation  
succeeded and that she was relieved of her pain.

I had an appointment with a good friend. He came 3 hours later  
than we agreed upon. During the last hour of waiting I was afraid  
something might had happened, because usally he is in time.

I worked together with another student on a computer-assignment.  
She didn't do her best and didn't prepare herself for it. She  
expected me to explain it to her.

I had a quarrel with a good friend about the fact that I didn't  
pay her a visit when she expected me to come. Hereafter I was  
very sad because it became a real quarrel.

I was hitch-hiking when a man stopped and gave me a lift to  
Nijmegen. During the ride he asked me whether I was in for fun.  
The man was fat and tatooed.
I forgot something I agreed upon with a good friend.

I became very angry with my friend because he didn't do shopping,  
while we agreed on him doing this. My being angry was proved to be  
without reason and I felt guilty about it.

When I got the positive result of my examination to achieve the  
Bachelor Degree in Plychology.

When I was 12 years old I frequently was pursued by others and  
got sound thrashes.

My girlfriend one day went out and promised to be back at 6.00 pm  
however she first arrived at 10.00 pm, without a message (we had  
to go out that evening).
When my girlfriend decided to finish our relation.

When once again I drank too much and felt very rotten the morning  
after.

When I overslept for the second time on the day I had an  
examination.
When having a relationship, I made love with another girl.
When the girl with whom I am in love smiles at me.

When biking and I felt very bad (problems with heart and  
respiration).

When a discussion resulted in an insult, which in my opinion, was  
not justified.

When I realized that it did not make much sense to start a  
relationship with a girl who was not very constructive to  
establish a firm relationship.
When I had to finish those big amounts of homework in time.

When I gave water to the plants of a friend. Then one plant fell  
over, and a little statue broke. I, of course, had to tell him  
everything.

When I had broken a piece of glass of the refrigerator by putting  
a hot pan in it.
On my birthday when several good friends came to visit me.

I went to the apartment of my boyfriend and saw some people  
before his door. I thought that something had happened.

My father called me (behind my mother's back) and told me that my  
mother disapproved my behavior in the weekend. However, he didn't  
tell me the details and left me with unanswered questions.

I felt very lonely, was very dissatisfied with myself when I  
realised that I could feel very jealous of other women because  
of my boyfriend.

A scene in a film in which one man repressed another one. By  
concidence, their position was reversed. The other man was  
repressed in an identical way as he did before.

When I do not succeed in making myself clear to other people.  
When they do not understand what I say.
After the death of a girl who I disliked.

I felt joyful when my boyfriend met me at the station, while at  
first he had said that he would not do that.

I was very startled when, at night at 2.00 am, a boy approached  
me and yelled "I fuck you", then however he stopped and laughed at  
me.

When someone does not listen to me after having asked me to  
repeat what I said. This happened more than one time with the  
same person.
I felt very sad when I heard that a friend had committed suicide.

One night I saw a man being knocked down by two other men. The  
victim was kicked against his head.

When I made acquaintance with the parents of my boyfriend for the  
first time. They spoke Limburgian (a dutch dialect) and one of my  
first remarks was that I disliked Limburgian dialect.

When I cancelled an appointment with an idle story. Afterwards  
it appeared that the person had looked forward to it and reserved  
time for it.

For a few days I felt very miserable, distressed and listless,  
with crying fits. When this was over I felt very happy, although  
there was no special reason.

I was testing my new roller skates in the street, suddenly a dog  
ran barking in my direction, very threatening. I was very  
startled and terribly upset.

Out on a weekend with a group of people, everybody felt irritated  
because at night the music didn't stop in time. And at breakfast  
my boyfriend ran away because we didn't agree with him. I felt  
angry.

Recently I felt very sad without any reason. It lasted for a few  
days. There was nothing I liked in that period.

Someone told me a story of Amnesty International: a boy was  
killed and his head was put in the litter of his girlfriend. It  
looked as if she was pregnant, then she died. It is disgusting, I  
can hardly write it down.

I cried for 3 hours because I felt very miserable. Then I called  
my boyfriend and he said lovely things to me. After this feeling  
disappeared I felt ashamed.

Yesterday my boyfriend and I wanted to play billiards. However  
there were boys playing (5 times). My boyfriend then is fed up  
and chagrined. In such case I think it is my fault.

When my boyfriend and I experience something nice or when we have  
made a nice walk together.

The weather is very bad (fog and slipperiness) the newcast  
reports many traffic accidents and my boyfriend is driving home  
and still has 60 kilometers to go.

Someone told me that he would stay at my home for one night.  
Therefore I made big efforts to make everything ok (food). One day  
before he cancelled the appointment because he had to go to  
church with his parents.

We had to take our cat to the vet for mercy killing (an  
injection).

When people are eating unsavoury (smacking, belching, speaking  
with food in their mouth, etc.).

A girl in our class was nicknamed "fatsy". Later, I heard that  
she suffered from diabetes mellitus.

I made an appointment to pick up someone. However I arrived  
too late and she had to wait a quarter of an hour.

One night I had a very good conversation with two friends. I then  
realized how worthy they were for me and how happy I was to  
have them as friends.
In the morning just before going to the dentist.

When a very close friend with whom I have a very intimate and  
bodily relationship (he had a girlfriend) started to avoid me and  
didn't want to talk to me any more.

When a good friend with whom I had an intimate relationship made  
clear that he didn't want to continue in the same way. He choose  
his girlfriend (also a friend of mine).

When I made love with someone who I didn't really love. Sometimes  
I even considered him unlikable.

I had a short lasting sexual relationship with someone I didn't  
love.

When I realized that I avoided two good friends with whom I  
always shared toys and sorrows. I made up idle stories to avoid  
telling them what happened to me.

My boyfriend suffered form ill health for some months, this week  
the physician told him that he was restored to health.

When going out in the weekend I have to bike 5 kilometers through  
lonely and dark polders, then I always have terrifying fantasies.

I made an appointment with a friend to drink coffee togehter.  
However, for the third time in that week she arrived an hour too  
late.

My dear hamster (called Hannes) died at the age of 2 and 1/2 years.  
His shape forced me to mercy killing (an injection).

I read a newspaper report that a little boy was forced to look  
while his sister was raped.

We had made an appointment to complete together a piece of work.  
It appeared that I was the only one who hadn't prepared anything.

I call my mother at least once a week. However last week I  
completely forgot. This morning she called me, she thought I felt  
ill.

After the funeral of an acquaintance I felt very depressed. That  
feeling turned into joy when I heard that I had achieved a good  
grade for an examination.

I had to call someone and make an appointment for a conversation.  
I was very afraid to fail.

When, after having cleaned up the kitchen, two hours later I saw  
that there was a big mess. It irritated me very much.

One night I was called and told that the father of a close friend  
died. When I visited my friend at home and when attending the  
funeral I felt very sad.

I cannot remember exactly such a situation. But I know that  
once I went to a very dirty lavatory and that disgusted me.

Once by coincidence I clutched a stranger (in a rather intimate  
way), thinking it was my boyfriend. When by hindsight I  
feel ashamed when thinking about it.

I once torn the inner tube of a bike, that was not mine. Then I  
saw it was a brand new one. I felt very guilty then.

When I found out that the girl, with whom I was in love, loved me  
too.

When my mother threatened me with thrushing me of the stairs, when  
I once more should make a comment.

When being made look a fool by the teacher in front of the class  
during a turn.

My mother unjustly became very angry with me and sent me to my  
room while my father explained that the way she saw things was  
not correct. I had done things with the best intentions.

My mother was very angry with my little sister and told her to  
put her hands on the table in order to beat her hands up. She  
forced by means of her power.

A friend came for dinner with me at home. His parents are  
ordinary people. My mother, however, used the very expensive  
porcelain dinner-service and the silver cutlery. I felt very  
ashamed.

Once after falling in love, I imagined that particular girl to be  
perfect and completely overshadowing my girlfriend. Afterwards I  
realized that this image was not objective. I felt guilty against  
both girls.

Once a week I work as a volunteer in a biologic garden. this work  
in the garden and the contact with other volunteers filled me  
with joy. They also gave me support after I failed passing my  
driver's test.

My friend and I planned to search for old documents and utensils  
in the cellar. It was very late at night when we arrived in the  
cellar. He indicated the place where the police (40 years ago) found  
two dead bodies. I got very scared when he told me this story.

When someone made me a compliment after an examination just at  
the moment I needed it. It was amicable, hearty and sincere.

When I went up the stairs in a high, dark house full of shadows,  
passed a door and had the feeling that someone or something was  
behind me, although I knew I was alone.

A friend told me it would be better for me not to be on familiar  
terms with another friend, although, in my opinion he had no  
reason to say such things. He only said so hoping that I  
would search support from him (that, however, was not necessary).

I had a good relationship with two friends. Once without reason,  
they clearly showed that they thought I was naive, dull and  
unable to take care for myself, while I expostulated that I could  
manage things.

When I see that some people remain cold and egoistic with regard  
to close friends, even in situations that those friends need  
them.

When I state things with great positiveness and try to convince  
others, and it appears that my statement is not right.

A certain friend evokes positive feelings, when I am with him but  
negative feelings when he is not present. I feel the need to  
express those negative feelings. However, when I speak about him,  
I always think: Why do I like this, he does not deserve this, but  
still I do so.

A few days ago, I hitch-hiked to Arnhems with a friend.  
Everything went well: they picked us up very quickly, the sun was  
shining, I was feeling free and, for the first time after long  
time, happy. I really had the feeling that I was living at full  
speed.

My grandmother several times has been struck by cerebral  
hemorrhages. Until now she recovered well each time, but there is  
always the threat to loose her.

I had made an appointment with three friends. We had to go out  
together. When I arrived at the place, the other persons weren't  
there. I became very angry because I thought they were gone  
without me. That, however, didn't appear to be the case.

I finished the relationship with my boyfriend, after having felt  
myself very unhappy for a long time.

A few days after I had finished the relationship with my  
boyfriend, we had a quarrel. Then he hit me. At that moment I  
found him disgusting.

I was taking a shower in a cubicle in France. Then I discovered  
that a few children were loking at me from the adjacent cubicle.

I know that a certain person feels very lonely, and that she  
always looks forward to seeing me. However, often I am too  
busy to visit her, then I feel guilty.

A close relative of mine underwent a difficult operation, and everything  
turned out fine.

When I get into the tube or the train without paying for the  
ticket.

A class-mate urged me to carry out a particular protest along  
with him, and when the time came this fellow drew back while I  
had to face the situation.
When I failed the entrance exam to IMEC.
When I saw someone eating live worms.

When I was a child my parents caught me with a pornographic  
magazine.

[ I can not remember anything in particular.  What I can remember  
is feelings of having done or said something which then had  
negative consequences.]
When they told me that I had got a study grant.
When I wore a grotesque figure hanging down my back.
Because I had not studied.
When my father was saved from a severe work accident.

When I was a child I hid under the sheets out of fear of  
darkness.
When I first saw a person begging.
When my basket ball team lost the qualification at a final.
When I see rotten meat.
When a person whom I do not want to see is continously present.
When I failed an exam I thought I could pass easily.

When I got to know that I had passed the university entrance  
exam.  I thought that I had done one of the exams badly.

When I was very young, one day, I was in the street with my  
father and brother.   While my father was talking to some  
friends, I saw a dog and began to pat it.  My father told me  
sharply to stop doing it because the dog had mange.  Then my  
brother told me that I would die and I could not stop crying  
after this.

We hitch hiked our way back from a town rather drunk.  We were  
dropped in another town which was unknown to us.  I needed to  
urinate, so I did it on a wall which turned out to belong to the  
military headquarters.  They arrested me and made me pay a fine  
of 500 pts.  We had to go home on foot (6 km) since it was too  
late for anyone to give us a lift.

I was to meet a girl in a discotheque.  She was very pretty and I  
was very happy.  But she did not turn up.  Thank God, there were  
some other friends there and I was able to have a more or less  
good time.

I had a class-mate who was rather stupid.  I did not like him  
but I respected him.  When he tried to talk to someone, they  
would not listen to him and I could not bear seeing this.

I met a friend in a discotheque. he was with a girl and he told  
me that she was not his girlfriend.  I, to say something,  
commented that she must be a viscious woman.  He then told me  
that she was his girl.

I went to a pub with a group of friends (not very close) and  
I was with one girl most of the time, while the other girls in the  
group wanted to be with me.  They stopped talking to the girl I  
was with.

The day some friends of mine and I decided to go to Galicia on  
holiday.
Before an exam which I, finally did not take.
At home when they lost three pieces of my puzzle.
When I had an argument with a friend.
When I am dirty because I have not had a shower for a few days.
Once I did not have enough money to pay for a coffee.
After an argument with a friend of mine.

A friend of mine told me that I had passed the entrance exam to  
the university.
Before taking an exam.

My family told me to leave if I was not willing to accept the  
conditions they imposed on me.

A friend of mine called me when I was not at home.  I phoned her  
back to know what she wanted and she told me that she had dialled  
the wrong number.
I had to change a baby's clothes for the first time.
I fell outside the door of my house.
My younger sister was almost run over by a lorry.
When my brother was born.

When I almost fell down from some rocks because I had been acting  
foolishly and playing dangerously.
Once I saw some children hunting a cat to death.
The death of a friend.
When I saw a scene on T.V where a castration was shown.
Once I answered my father rudely.

When my brother ran away from home and I thought it was because  
of my continously scolding him.

When I saw that I had passed the university entrance exam.  It  
made me forget all my problems.

When I was ten I got shut in the school with a friend.  I had to  
jump out of a window and cross a beam 10 metres high.

When I was told that a boy did not want to be my friend without  
any apparent reason.

When I learnt that a boy I liked had been with a girl for three  
years.

When a very dirty class-mate farted in my  presence.  There was a  
terrible smell.

When I realized that I had a hole in my trousers after having gone  
for a walk.

When I had an argument with my grandfather the day my younger  
brother was born.

When I saw my 16 year old sister at home after having waited for  
her all night, not knowing where she was.

While I was waiting for them to give me the marks of the most  
difficult subject this year.

I had an argument with my mother because I criticized the rules  
she imposes at home, which are too rigid and arbitrary for me.

When I learned that a friend of mine had not been speaking to her  
boyfriend for a week after an argument because of unfounded  
jealousy.
On seeing a scene of an accident in a magazine.

A few days back I had to ask a professor a ridiculous question  
because I had lost at a game of cards and had to pay a forfeit.
When I shouted at my mother when she was nervous and depressed.

After several days delay in my girlfriend's menstration I was  
very glad to see that the pregnancy test was negative.

When I saw a TV program on the North American military plan  
called "The startwar".

I felt angry when I saw on T.V the last slaughter of negroes in  
South Africa.
When I saw the pictures of the draught in Etiopia.
Whenever I see an alcoholic.

On New Year's Eve, when I went to the house of my girlfriend's  
parents to meet them.

When I failed an exam for which I knew that I had not studied  
hard enough.

The day the Real Madrid team of basket ball qualified for the  
final at Athens.

The last time I was face to face with with the monstrous dog  
which lives in my street.

During a trivial (friendly) discussion, one of the participants  
made an intervention which made me feel uncomfortable.

When I heard the last regulation of the socialist govrenment  
concerning pensions.
When I got to know the details if the famine in East Africa.

The last time I had to phone the Registry, after having called  
them so many times in the last few days.

During an argument with my brother, I behaved rather  
intransigently, even cruelly, wishing to morally hurt the "person"  
opposed to me.
When I passed an important exam.

In a rather important exam, when they caught me red handed  
copying.

When my father addressed me directly and maliciously, thus  
including me in the "family war".
When my parents got divorced.

When I was a child, one day while playing, I fell up to my waist  
in mud.
When I was dismissed from a job after having been accused of theft.

When I was with a girl who seemed to love me, while I was with  
her just to go to bed with her.
When I passed an exam which I had failed last year.
When I go out alone at night.
A murder.
When I failed two subjects last year.
When I see people who have no sentiments.

I think that I am rather shy and do not mix with people as I  
would have liked to, out of shyness.
When I triffled with other people.

When I was told that I could take a week off and go for a trip  
with my friends.
Every time I went home with my school report.

During an argument between friends, one of them accused me of  
taking advantage of some other friends who usually come to the  
university in my car, saying that I ask them too much money for  
the petrol.
When I learned that two of my friends had had a serious car accident.
A young man was insulting and humiliating a drunken man.

My aunt phoned me to ask me why I had refused the her invitation  
to dinner at her home on the New Year's Eve.

I was with a girl one night and then did not call her again,  
although she had asked me to do so.

When I saw that I had passed an exam.  It was the last chance and  
there was a lot at stake.

On a trip to Santander we wanted to stop at a curve because a  
friend was sick, and the car skidded of the gravel.

My cousins were playing at home and one of them broke a decorative  
object which was very precious to me.

All my friends arranged to go for an afternoon snack and they did  
not tell me.  They told me that they did not have my phone number  
but I do not think that this was true.

When I saw a film where a black was rapeing a girl while another one was  
filming it for a pornographic movie.

I was swimming in the sea and a wave took the top part of my  
bikini away.

I was looking after a child and she fell down because I was not  
paying her much attention.  One side of her face got bruised.

When I pass exams, or when a close friend of mine recovered  
from an illness,etc.

Fights that I see in the middle of the street, robberies, fear of  
darkness when going home.

During a family discussion on my future and my prospects as a  
student, they accused me of not bothering about looking for a job to  
assume my financial situation.
[ Depressions.]

Some people whom I do not like at all, and one of the reasons is  
their physical appearance.

For example, to feel bad because of one's attire, to be among  
people who do not belong to the same social class, to give a  
wrong answer in class, to be surprised in particular situations.

Some of my friends had an argument.  I had earlier phoned one  
of them and that may have influenced him to argue.

When I met a very close friend of mine after one year of  
separation.

There was an earthquake for several minutes and I was on the  
eight floor.

An argument among several friends because of the irrational  
behavior of one of them who fell out with us for no reason and  
said that we were to blame.

A class-mate died after being two months in coma, after a car  
accident.
Pictures of Nazi extermination camps on a T.V program.

Equivocal situation when filling a security questionnaire on  
entering a government building with several people there.

I left a boy with whom I was going around without giving him any  
explanations.
When my sister was born.
When they tried to rob me.
When I failed an exam unfairly.
When my grandmother died.
When I see dead dogs on the road.

When I went to see the doctor and had to take my clothes off so  
that he could examine me.

When my parents quarelled over something I had done and which was  
wrong.
When my little sister was born.

When I was attending an authorized demonstrationand the police  
rushed brutally at the demonstrators, without any warning.

When a professor of this faculty laughed at, and was suspicious of  
a composition written by a class-mate and me.
The death of a relative, friend, or someone I esteem.
When I saw a very disagreable scene.
When I had to represent my boss at a meeting.

When I inadvertantly made some close friends and relatives feel  
bad.
When I passed an exam.
When they threatened me with a knife to take my money.
When I failed an exam I thought I would pass.
When my dog died.
When I saw an accident where the man lost his head.
When I tripped while getting on a bus.
When I hurt a person's feelings.

I had not seen my brother for five years as he was not in Spain.    
When he arrived at the airport, I felt great joy.
When two drug addicts tried to take away my money.
When I saw my brother being attacked and I could not do anything.
When a class-mate died.

When a person saw that I was accused of something I had not done  
and did not do anything to defend me.
When inadvertantly I found myself in the ladies room.
When I broke something and a friend of mine was blamed.

I got my driving licence after they had frightened me with it's  
difficulty.

When I had to walk over three kms through a field which had wild bulls,  
because my car had broken down.

When I saw a man hitting a child of 2 years without any consideration,  
simply because the child had been leaning against a window.

A friend of mine who was driving a car ahead of me died in a  
car accident.
When I had to dissect a live mouse at school.

When I was a child I had to recite a poem in a show at the end of  
the term.

When I saw a program on Ethiopia on T.V, a fews hours earlier I  
had thrown away some clothes and food.

When I saw that the mark I had obtained in an exam was a good  
one.

We were in the country and I walked away from the others one  
night.  Suddenly something moved sharply in front of me and I was  
not able to see what it was.

When I was young, I became very angry as I was not allowed to  
stay up all night for the fair in my town.

When summer is over and I have to leave the town where I spend my  
holidays.

When I saw several people washing their car with water from a  
drain.

When I inadvertantly entered the ladies room and met some girls  
on my way out.

I was entrusted with an object and while using it I handled it  
carelessly and it broke.

When I learned, after the ecography, that my mother was expecting a  
baby girl.  That was what I wanted.
